verbs.description: [ARG0: Thousands of people] [V: protested] [ARGM-LOC: in cities around the U.S.] [ARGM-ADV: against the Trump administration 's policy of separating migrant children from their parents] .
Thousands of people protested in cities around the U.S. against the Trump administration 's policy of [V: separating] [ARG1: migrant children] [ARG2: from their parents] .
